values:
So, I inadvertently started a pretty ruthless brush fire today while shooting fireworks. 

Pictures later.
I have the most beautiful girlfriend, and I miss her right now.
Blessings upon the throne of tyranny.
I'd hate for her to not want me around her daughter.
I contend that we are both atheists. I just believe in one fewer god than you do. When you understand why you dismiss all the other possible gods, you will understand why I dismiss yours.

Cookiepuss




Cookiekisses


Queen of the mountain.


Thief!!! (P.S. WTF was Sarah watching on T.V.?!?!)


If cookie were an evil wizard.


Yes, Sarah really is that gorgeous.


... and one where cookie kind of paid attention.
Eragon is, quite possibly, the worst movie in the history of movies. I'd rather watch that Dungeons and Dragons movie on repeat for the rest of my life than ever watch Eragon again.

This is me... with no friends.

I could count them on one hand with fingers left over.

I want to stick some people in the fucking throat. I feel so fucking hostile.

It's amazing just how little people actually care about you. Corpus Christi is so fucking dead to me. Texas in general. I just want to run away.

I'm going to go to sleep now... when I wake up, I want the world to be different.

Find your own stomping ground and get your own fucking friends. Go smoke some weed you fucking fake. I'd sooner see you dead. I hate just about everyone.

I feel alive today. I feel useful. I feel loved.

I want to buy a moped/gas scooter type thing. Anybody selling one?

Milkshake races...

It's moments like that those that make life worth living.

Take my pride, I couldn't use it now
Take my will to mend this broken heart
I don't want to be here today. I want to be in the sun. I want to be in the sun with you. I need its light... I need your warmth.

On the 12th day of christmas my friendster gave to me
12 tight black t-shirts
11 pair of diesels
10 vegan cookies
9 LJ Comments
8 kids a'moshin
7 inch rare vinyl
6 hot topic gift cards
I'm in chaos crew
4 backstage passes
3 drug free x's
2 dog tags
and my first pair of sauconys
You have changed everything in the most beautiful way.
What to do with me? I just don't know.
Today is my favorite kind of day.
It's a different kind of pain... when someone's there to hold you, someone there to take you away from me.
I wrote this song and the world will sing it. To me, it's everything to me, she's everything to me.
Major thanks to Bobby for covering the CDC show for me, and also, thanks to everyone who made it out. <3
I'm ok! After all of this time, I feel like I'm finally going to be ok.

The fan belt in my car broke.

(insert whiny rant here)
I'm in desperate need of something to do today.
So, I'm finally out of the hospital.
I hate a lot of stuff.

You've got your airplane
And I've got the plain air of here
You're gone and I've gone insane
Oh when will you reappear
I'm just some new kid
Who can't get his mind off of you
And I know that it's stupid

Cause you've got Hawaii
And I've gotten no letters from you
I should stop whining
Cause its only been a day or two...
I don't know what you did
But you got me to fall for you
I know it's stupid

Del Mar, if you were a dragon, I'd slay you.

I'm about to go to Math... but I think I'd rather swallow a shotgun shell.
For those of you who don't like George Strait, you've just become significantly less important to me. <3
I just got released from the Hospital. I guess I'm ok for now. As ok as I suppose I can be.

Awful fucking lyrics, even for a bullshit Christian band... but the music is catchy and mindless, and there are two decent tracks on here, "Not For Sale", and "A Year From Now":



xLooking Forwardx - "The Path We Tread": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=R7Q0HBPL

MySpace
Everytime I see your face, I'm reminded of what it means to be alive.
Why am I awake!? This is fucking ridiculous.
You can't be close enough unless I'm feeling your heartbeat.
I swear, one day I'm just going to blow up the entire Geek Squad department at Best Buy.

I messed up.

I relapsed, and it just hurt so fucking bad. It's not even the situation that really kills me, so much as it is the memory of what it was like to go through what I went through.

Don't get me wrong though, the situation is murder... but these things have a way of working themselves out. I know I'm stronger than this, and I know I'm right for this. I'll stay positive. We'll make it through this together.

I swear.


Here's for listening to me cry:


Crime In Stereo - "The Troubled Stateside": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=380LDMSD

MySpace

I'm sorry.

I will be stronger.

I feel all broken inside.


Listen to this:



Kids Like Us - "Outta Control": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6S5DXS09

MySpace

This is interesting:



Zolof The Rock And Roll Destroyer - "Popsicle" EP: http://www.filesend.net/download.php?f=5ed682abf222fae7a682fcf41c395829

MySpace

The best album of 2006:



Misery Signals - "Mirrors": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GN3OE92C

MySpace

one pill will get me through the day
but I take two anyway
when I take three pills the song begins to play
one that won't go away. And even though I know
one pill will get me through the day
I take two anyway
when I mix four pills with a drink the song starts to play
its in the back of my head and its everywhere
and its all I can think about

it was obvious that there was something more to this
patient. something had been missed. "it's this hole i can see in each of his eyes...
where all of the events that happen in this real world kind of just fall through"
it's loneliness, it's loneliness

We (burn these thoughts) have changed our name to Ever Onward. We're now playing shows again, so check us out.

MySpace
MySpace
MySpace

Destiny - "The Tracy Chapter": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PAX7X4CP
Sounds like a German Poison the Well.

MySpace

Work is really fucking slow today, so here are a few more I uploaded for you guys:



Sex Positions - "Self-Titled": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=AFQ903EW
(members of XfilesX)

MySpace



Stil Remains - "If Love Was Born To Die" EP: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IP9ZWVPV
(Good, though generic, christian, metalcore)

MySpace

These insecurities will pass... I just need a full day of sleep. Blissful lethargy.


This is what happens when members of With Honor make music with members of Shai Hulud:



Ambitions - "Question": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=19YEQ1MU

MySpace

I started listening to this again recently:



Brand New - "Deja Entendu": http://www.megaupload.com/?d=7N13GWTM

MySpace

P.S. Are yall actually downloading these? Just wondering.
